about_the_game:
Experience the cinematic soundtrack for The Atlas Mystery, an atmospheric puzzle game from Top Right Corner that drops players into a 1940's era movie palace full of peculiar puzzles and detailed environments.

Composed by Evan Goldman (additional composer on The Falcon and the Winter Soldier, Detective Pikachu) and Chris Ryan (orchestrator on Shazam!), The Atlas Mystery Official Soundtrack perfectly captures the grandiose nature of Old Hollywood, providing a riveting backdrop as you uncover the tragic circumstances that plague the Atlas Theater.
